text: Celebrated the passage of my bill to memorialize Justices Ginsburg & O’Connor w/ statues at the Capitol, pictured here w/ @SpeakerPelosi & @RepLoisFrankel! Grateful to my Senate cosponsors, Justice O’Connor’s son Scott, & Justice Ginsburg’s former clerk @KelsiCorkran. So special. https://t.co/VpadWDDQNZ
This #MentalHealthAwarenessMonth, I hope everyone will take the time they need to take care of themselves. Please remember: your health and well-being matter.

Throughout our state and country, new graduates are walking across commencement stages to receive their diplomas this weekend. I know the last few years haven’t been easy, but you persevered. You did it! So congratulations to all of this year’s graduates. I am so proud of you!
At the end of the day the question is this: who gets to make personal decisions for women? Is it politicians or is it women themselves?

NEWS: Legislation I introduced with @SenBobCasey and @SenBlumenthal to prevent furniture tip-overs passed the Commerce Committee with bipartisan support! This is a major step forward as we work to strengthen safety standards to protect children.

https://t.co/2MyHBpxmJ2
I spoke on the Senate floor about the importance of protecting women’s freedom to make reproductive health decisions. Watch here: https://t.co/nbzalPdWVC
